Package com.islandpower.configurator.model

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.model.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Represents a solar charge controller, including its technical specifications and performance parameters. This model defines the attributes of a controller, such as its rated power, voltage range, type, and efficiency.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(String id, String name, double ratedPower, double currentRating, double maxVoltage, double minVoltage, String type, double efficiency)
      Constructs a Controller object with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - - the unique identifier for the controller
      name - - the name of the controller
      ratedPower - - the rated power of the controller in watts (W)
      currentRating - - the maximum current rating of the controller in amperes (A)
      maxVoltage - - the maximum input voltage of the controller in volts (V)
      minVoltage - - the minimum input voltage of the controller in volts (V)
      type - - the type of the controller (e.g., PWM, MPPT)
      efficiency - - the efficiency of the controller as a percentage
